text.section:
A person is guilty of sodomy in the second degree when:
Being eighteen (18) years old or more, he engages in deviate sexual intercourse with another person less than fourteen (14) years old; or
He engages in deviate sexual intercourse with another person who is mentally incapacitated.
Sodomy in the second degree is a Class C felony.

law.history: Amended 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 259, sec. 4, effective July 15, 2002. -- Created 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 406, sec. 88, effective January 1, 1975.
